projects.title: Quote Generator
projects.description: A project to practice my knowledge of basic JavaScript syntax and data structures by building a Random Quote Generator. This page displays a randomly selected quote each time the user clicks a button. Quote will also reload, after a few seconds, if no one interacts with the page.

projects.title: Pagination & Content Filter
projects.description: Long lists don't make for a good user experience on a web page. In this project, I enhanced the usability of a web page that contains a long list by employing JavaScript to dynamically divide the list into "pages". I also added a search feature to display only the students that match the search criteria.

projects.title: Interactive Form
projects.description: Full Stack JavaScript developers create forms to collect information from users for nearly every website and application they build. For this project, you’ll use your skills to enhance a form so that it’s engaging, interactive, and easy to use.

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
projects.description: Build a fun two-person Tic-Tac-Toe game. Use professional programming techniques to solve data-modeling problems, write elegant JavaScript code, and apply higher level concepts like object-oriented programming.

projects.title: Movie Search App
projects.description: Use JavaScript to communicate with another website using an API (application programming interface) to retrieve and display information about your favorite albums. You’ll create a form to search and view information about films while practicing your skills using AJAX to load data from a server.
